title: Karl Jenkins - Stabat Mater
description:
As in his earlier "Mass for Peace" and "Requiem", Karl Jenkins supplements the traditional Latin text of the Stabat Mater with original words and words from other poets, sung in English, Hebrew, Aramaic and Arabic.  This is moving heart-on-the-sleeve music that speaks of suffering mothers then and now. 

01 Cantus Lacrimosus
02 Incantation
03 Vidit Jesum In Tormentis
04 Lament
05 Sancta Mater
06 Now My Life Is Only Weeping
07 And the Mother Did Weep
08 Virgo Virginum
09 Are You Lost Out in the Darkness
10 Ave Verum
11 Fac, Ut Portem Christi Mortem
12 Paradisi Gloria
